titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 55) requiring the President to develop and implement a plan for the withdrawal of United States Armed Forces from Iraq.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Abercrombie. Petition No: 109-6.

bill.summary: 11/9/2005--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 55) requiring the President to develop and implement a plan for the withdrawal of United States Armed Forces from Iraq.
